name: SqlInjectionMatchSet
shortDesc: The AWS::WAF::SqlInjectionMatchSet resource creates an AWS WAF SqlInjectionMatchSet, which you use to allow, block, or count requests that contain malicious SQL code in a specific part of web requests. For more information, see CreateSqlInjectionMatchSet in the AWS WAF API Reference.

properties.name: Name
properties.desc: A friendly name or description of the SqlInjectionMatchSet.

properties.name: SqlInjectionMatchTuples
properties.desc: The parts of web requests that you want AWS WAF to inspect for malicious SQL code and, if you want AWS WAF to inspect a header, the name of the header.
properties.type: List of AWS WAF SqlInjectionMatchSet SqlInjectionMatchTuples
